list_definition.definition: anything said or done to cause laughter

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He told/made the old joke about the elephant in the refrigerator
He dressed up as a ghost for a joke
He played a joke on us and dressed up as a ghost.

list_definition.definition: something that causes laughter or amusement

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The children thought it a huge joke when the cat stole the fish.

list_definition.definition: to make a joke or jokes

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They joked about my mistake for a long time afterwards.

list_definition.definition: to talk playfully and not seriously

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Don’t be upset by what he said – he was only joking.
